ComicInfo.Summary: Cynthia Crudgill has brought her anti-horror campaign to Rutherglen, which spells bad news for Monster-Dome Video and for the efforts of Thumper and his friends to finish their movie. But things are about to get much worseâ€¦because Red Ennis is no longer taking direction and no longer disappearing once the cameras stop rolling!
